content.prompt: Assume the government introduces a lump-sum tax on each firm within a perfectly competitive industry. Which of the following will be true after the introduction of this tax?

choices.label: There will be no change in any firm’s level of profits
A deadweight efficiency loss will occur
There will be no change in the market quantity of output
Each firm’s short-run marginal cost curve will increase
